description: Hexora OSC Receiver Configuration - Controls /hexora_open and /hexora_close commands
note: Only works in PV (Profile Velocity) mode
slaves_note: Slave numbers (1-indexed). Example: [1, 2] for slaves 1 and 2

speed.acc_dec_speed_note: Speed at start/end of movement for smooth accel/decel

movement.decel_distance_note: Start decelerating when this close to target (meters)
movement.min_distance_for_cruise_note: If total distance < this, skip cruise phase and use slow speed only
movement.ramp_steps_note: Number of speed increments during accel/decel
movement.ramp_interval_note: Seconds between speed updates during ramping
